::Savanna::

She flew off Predator.  The rifle and foot connected to her at the 
same time. She flew back and fell to the ground.  She didn't have 
much energy left and couldn't take much more of a beating.  She 
opened her commlink. "If any Maximal can hear me, there are three 
Preds heading for the Ark. Protect the Ark. Please, If you can home 
in on my signal. I need help." She got up and looked at the three 
bots. Her side was dripping mech fluid.  Her jaw swelling from the 
kick.  Her body pulsing in pain, she charged again.  She slashed at 
Predator aiming for his face. She tried to rip out his eyes and slash 
the rest of his face. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:
> 
> 
> Predator slammed on his back, trying to hold Savanna's claws at 
bay, which 
> were cutting him up.
> "Get it off, get it off, get it off!"
> 
> Choran raised the barrel of his rifle to point at Savanna's back, 
but 
> Imprisoner shook his head.
> 
> Choran swung the laser rifle hard at Savanna's left side.
> 
> Imprisoner stepped up to Predator, sending a foot at Savanna's face.
